projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.movieTicketBookingDescription: A web-based Movie Ticket Booking System built with Yii2 (PHP). It allows users to browse movies, check seat availability, and book tickets online, while admins manage theaters, movies, and reservations.
projects.movieFinderDescription: The Movie Finder App lets users search for movies and view trending titles using the TMDB API. Built with React, it displays movie details and tracks search activity.
projects.allergyAppDescription: This app provides a straightforward answer to the amount of allergy medication that is required for a day. It calls API Ambee and OpenWeatherMap than calculates how strong the pollen concentration and how hot the weather is.
